text: Propilidium is a genus of sea snails, the true limpets, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Lepetidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Propilidium include: * Propilidium curumim Leal & Simone, 1998 * Propilidium elegans A. E. Verrill, 1884 * Propilidium exiguum (Thompson W., 1844) * Propilidium lissocona (Dall, 1927) * Propilidium pelseneeri Thiele, 1912 * Propilidium pertenue Jeffreys, J.G., 1882 * Propilidium reticulatum (A. E. Verrill, 1885) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Lepetidae
title: Propilidium
